    Syntax

    We can make headings!

    Heading 1

    Heading 2

    Heading 3

    Heading 4

    Text can be bold, italicized, or both.

    1. Lists
    2. Can be
    3. Ordered

    • Not ordered

    We can upload pictures. 

    We can make code blocks.

    Strike through words.

    • Complete a task list
    • Finish my analyses
    • Save the world
